page.title: 19A Day in the life of:
page.content: Mrs Lynn James gets up around 7.30am and makes breakfast.Then her husband and children come down,they have cereals and toast.Every Tuesday and Thursday morning,she takes Lee(her son) to play group,but on other mornings she does general house-work.At 11.00am she has a cup of coffee and Lee has a drink of pop,but if Lee is at playgroup Lynn, has to leave at 11.00am to pick him up. Then by that time it's lunch.Adele(her daughter)goes back to school around 1.00pm.Then in the afternoon,if she has some ironing to do she'll do that,or take Lee to the park.She sometimes watches the television in the afternoon.They have a snack for tea, then Adele and Lee are sent up to bed. A couple of hours later Lynn and her husband go to bed.
